title: T211 Red Suns : Looking for Trading Partner
author: DixieBaseball

posts.post_title: T211 Red Suns : Looking for Trading Partner
posts.post_content:
Anyone interested in swapping T211's, feel free to give me a jingle. I have a few from different teams, and would not mind shaking it up a bit as well as possibly helping out a fellow collector.

(I can trade at a premium, meaning 3 for 2, 2 for 1, etc. depending on player, team, etc.) Please don't hesitate to let me know if you are interested in upgrading or trading T211's. I will make it worth your while if I locate something I am interested in collecting.

Please email in confidence to :

[url]jeremyj70@comcast.net[/url]

Thanks,

JJ

Hey Jeremy

I added a for trade album in my 54 profile-check it out and let me know if anything interest you. Plus you know my newest project-there may be something in there we could come up with a trade

[url]stemmers37@att.net[/url]

T211 Friendly Trading Partner Bump ( I can trade at a premium, meaning 3 for 2, 2 for 1, etc. depending on player, team, etc.) Please don't hesitate to let me know if you are interested in upgrading or trading T211's. I will make it worth your while if I locate something I am interested in....

Best,

J
